'''''A Glossary of the Eldarin Tongues''''' is a reference book to the [[Elvish]] languages in [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works.
==Contents==
*Introduction
*Abbreviations
*Quenya
**Notes on the Structure of Quenya
**Pronunciation of Quenya
**Quenya Vocabulary
*Sindarin
**Notes on the Structure of Sindarin
**Pronunciation of Sindarin
**Sindarin Vocabulary
*Note Page
*Appendices
**A. Khuzdul
**B. The Black Speech
**C. The Edain-related Tongues
**D. The Writing Systems
*Conversion of the Page References to the Ballantine Edition
